biography.summary: Lisa A. Murkowski is an American politician serving as a United States Senator from Alaska since 2003. A Republican, she has been known for her pragmatic and occasionally independent approach within the party, focusing on energy, federal spending, and Alaska issues.
biography.career: Before joining the Senate, Murkowski pursued public service in Alaska and was appointed to the U.S. Senate in 2003; she has since become one of Alaska's longest-serving senators.

contact.office_address: 522 Hart Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510
